ApproxsimClient.timeline
Class TimelineActivityTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      ApproxsimClient.timeline.TimelineActivityTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, EventListener, TableModel, ApproxsimEventListener
public class TimelineActivityTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
implements ApproxsimEventListener

The table model for the table of activities.

See Also:

public void sort(int col)
Sorts the table. It's sorted with respect to the values of the column where the sorting is initialized.
